definitions.body: Paran, Faran (cf. n.pr. [[פארן]] Sin. Inscr.);—usu. ´[[מִדְבַּר פ]] home of Ishmael Ge 21:21 (E), traversed by Isr. in Exodus Nu 12:16 (E), Nu 10:12, Nu 13:2, Nu 13:26 (all P); it lay NE. fr. (the traditional) Sinai, with Gulf of Akaba and the ï Arabah as its E. border; in the same region was ´[[הַר פ]] De 33:2, Hb Hab 3:3, —perh. coast-range of mts. along W. shore of Gulf of Akaba; ´[[פ]] alone 1Ki 11:18, 1Ki 11:18 (betw. Midian and Egypt); De 1:1 (loc. dub.).—1Sa 25:1 v. II. [[מָעוֹן]] sub [[עון]].—Vid. Rob:BR i, 177 f. Palmer:Desert of Exodus, 284 ff., Di Dr:Dt.
